resources.string: A random sequence of Tetriminos fall down the playing field (a rectangular vertical shaft, called the "well" or "matrix"). The objective of the game is to manipulate these Tetriminos, by moving each one sideways and/or rotating by quarter-turns, so that they form a solid horizontal line without gaps. The game ends when the stack of Tetriminos reaches the top of the playing field and no new Tetriminos are able to enter.
Use the upper-right menu to pause the game
